posts.post_content:
Wow the alternate planeswalker art for him and Bolas are fantastic.  
  
And it's nice to see Ajani Vengeant get another printing, and some respect. I've always been partial to him and his roguish enemy-color ways. Hopefully with Innistrad's enemy-color dual lands and Kiora Atua and Ral Zarek out there (plus possibly Innistrad's Garruk), we'll see more 'walkers like him soon.  
  
(Edit)  
And within literally minutes of posting that, [Garruk Relentless](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Garruk Relentless )  gets spoilered. Although he's not *really* enemy colored if you're talking casting cost, his flipped form is G/B.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: I'm relatively new to Magic and I have a question. If my friend plays Ajani Vengeant's ability to destroy all my lands and if I have [Privileged Position](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Privileged Position) out, would my Privileged Position's ability protect my lands?
posts.html:
I'm relatively new to Magic and I have a question. If my friend plays Ajani Vengeant's ability to destroy all my lands and if I have Privileged Position out, would my Privileged Position's ability protect my lands?
Report Abuse  
Posted By: kimjong7hrill (9/11/2011 12:22:24 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This guy over Nicol Bolas any day. U can get Ajani out on turn 3 or 4 and Nicol on 7 or 8. By then the other guy's lands r destroyed and u can't cast Nicol.
posts.html:
This guy over Nicol Bolas any day. U can get Ajani out on turn 3 or 4 and Nicol on 7 or 8. By then the other guy's lands r destroyed and u can't cast Nicol.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: Gcrudaplaneswalker (9/11/2011 2:42:39 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: @Kim Yes, it would be destroyed...hexproof doesn't matter, the lands aren't being targeted, it's a field effect. However, [Terra Eternal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terra Eternal) would protect those lands, if they're indestructible, then destroying them won't work.
posts.html:
@Kim Yes, it would be destroyed...hexproof doesn't matter, the lands aren't being targeted, it's a field effect. However, Terra Eternal would protect those lands, if they're indestructible, then destroying them won't work.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: Telltalereaper (9/12/2011 6:17:46 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Crowning moment of a 5 match Duel Deck off with me and a bud? Swinging into a helpless Ajani Vengeat who was at 7 counters with [Jhessian Zombies](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jhessian Zombies).  
There was nothing he could do. My lands remained intact. And that's why its so tempting not to landcycle the bastards.
posts.html:
Crowning moment of a 5 match Duel Deck off with me and a bud? Swinging into a helpless Ajani Vengeat who was at 7 counters with Jhessian Zombies.
There was nothing he could do. My lands remained intact. And that's why its so tempting not to landcycle the bastards.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: Kryptnyt (9/17/2011 7:37:39 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: @kimjong7hrill: [Priviledged Position](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Priviledged Position) won't save your lands from this card. Ajani's ultimate doesn't target any lands, and Priviledged Position doesn't stop *you* from being targeted, so Ajani will destroy your lands.
posts.html:
@kimjong7hrill: Priviledged Position won't save your lands from this card. Ajani's ultimate doesn't target any lands, and Priviledged Position doesn't stop you from being targeted, so Ajani will destroy your lands.
